page.title: 02POPULATION CONTINUED
page.content:
beautiful countryside.We read that in the original Domesday book that our village had land for three ploughs.In lordship one and a half ploughs 3 slaves.Four villagers with one small holder have one and a half ploughs. Three acres of meadow,four hundred acres of pasture, and the village was worth 20 shillings!
The village trail is a network of foot paths and roads and fields that run through Clyst Hydon.It crosses the river Clyst twice.There is a lot of wild life along the trail.We made some pamphlets and sold them for 5p each. There are 24 houses along the trail. Two people called Dave and Jane helped us by going around the trail and taking photos with us.
